# Security Fest CTF 2019

I have just solved some problem.

## Writeup

### Infant RSA

```python
n = 
e1 = 1761208343503953843502754832483387890309882905016316362547159951176446446095631394250857857055597269706126624665037550324
e2 = 855093981351105496599755851929196798921968934195328015580099609660702808256223761150292012944728436937787478856194680752
x = 
y = 
c = 

xe2 = pow(x,e2,n)
ye1 = pow(y,e1,n)
z = ye1 - pow(inverse_mod(3,n)*7,e1*e2,n)*xe2
p = Integer(gcd(z,n))

assert n%p == 0
q = n/p
phi = (p-1)*(q-1)
bezout = xgcd(65537, phi);
d = Integer(mod(bezout[1], phi))
print `hex(power_mod(c,d,n)).decode('hex')`
```
